articles.description: With the ball, the Punjab Kings were slightly expensive as rookie Vaibhav Arora leaked runs at over 10 runs. Rahul Chahar too was taken for a ride by 18-year-old South Africa batter Dewald Brevis, who hit the spinner for four sixes in a row. | Cricket
articles.content: Mayank Agarwal-led Punjab Kings completed a thrilling 12-run win over the Mumbai Indians in the ongoing clash of the Indian Premier League (IPL). Riding on some solid batting display by Shikhar Dhawa… [+2964 chars]

articles.author: Pratyush Raj
articles.title: Umran Malik: From a ‘Gully Boy’ to making 150kph the new normal in IPL - The Indian Express
articles.description: The father, coach, and mentors track the rise and rise of India's fastest bowler from Jammu & Kashmir.
articles.content: No one asks me for extra chillies and coriander leaves. They dont negotiate prices. The perks of being the father of the fastest Indian pacer are small but sweet for Abdul Rashid, a fruit seller in J… [+6462 chars]
